controls.title: Identity and Access Management
controls.description: Implement proper identity and access management controls for Firehose delivery streams

implementation.description: Define IAM roles and policies with least privilege access to Firehose delivery streams using CloudFormation or Terraform

controls.title: Data Security and Information Lifecycle Management
controls.description: Ensure data encryption in transit and at rest for all Firehose delivery streams

implementation.description: Configure server-side encryption using AWS KMS keys and enable SSL/TLS encryption for data in transit

controls.title: Governance and Risk Management
controls.description: Establish governance framework for Firehose stream management and data handling

implementation.description: Implement AWS Config rules to monitor Firehose configuration compliance and AWS Organizations policies

controls.title: Data Classification
controls.description: Classify data flowing through Firehose streams and apply appropriate protection measures

implementation.description: Tag Firehose delivery streams with data classification labels and implement data loss prevention measures

controls.title: Application and Interface Security
controls.description: Secure APIs and interfaces used to interact with Firehose

implementation.description: Implement VPC endpoints for Firehose API calls and configure API throttling limits

controls.title: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorizations for logical access to Firehose resources

implementation.description: Implement resource-based policies and IAM policies with explicit deny statements for unauthorized access

controls.title: Transmission Confidentiality and Integrity
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted information through Firehose

implementation.description: Enable SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmission and configure encryption parameters in delivery stream settings

controls.title: Audit Events
controls.description: Identify the types of events to be logged related to Firehose operations

implementation.description: Enable CloudTrail logging for all Firehose API calls and configure CloudWatch logging for delivery stream events

controls.title: Protection of Information at Rest
controls.description: Protect information at rest in Firehose buffers and destination storage

implementation.description: Configure KMS encryption for Firehose delivery streams and ensure destination storage encryption

controls.title: System Monitoring
controls.description: Monitor Firehose delivery streams for security events and anomalies

implementation.description: Configure CloudWatch alarms for delivery failures, data transformation errors, and unusual traffic patterns

controls.title: System Backup
controls.description: Ensure backup capabilities for critical Firehose configurations

implementation.description: Version control Firehose configurations in Infrastructure as Code templates and implement cross-region replication

controls.title: Kinesis Data Firehose delivery streams should be encrypted at rest
controls.description: This control checks whether Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery streams are encrypted at rest

implementation.description: Configure SSEConfiguration with KMS encryption in delivery stream definition

controls.title: Kinesis Data Firehose delivery streams should be encrypted at rest
controls.description: This control checks whether Amazon Kinesis Data Firehose delivery streams are encrypted at rest

implementation.description: Enable server-side encryption using AWS KMS customer managed keys in delivery stream configuration

cost.name: AWS Kinesis Data Firehose Cost Optimization

controls.title: Optimize buffer settings
controls.description: Configure appropriate buffer size and interval to minimize costs while meeting delivery requirements

implementation.description: Set buffer size to maximum (128 MB) and buffer interval to maximum (900 seconds) when latency requirements allow

controls.title: Implement data compression
controls.description: Enable data compression to reduce data transfer and storage costs

implementation.description: Configure GZIP compression in the delivery stream configuration for supported destinations

controls.title: Optimize data transformation
controls.description: Minimize data transformation overhead and Lambda invocation costs

implementation.description: Use efficient Lambda functions for data transformation and consider batch processing to reduce invocation frequency

controls.title: Right-size delivery stream configuration
controls.description: Monitor and adjust delivery stream settings based on actual usage patterns

implementation.description: Use CloudWatch metrics to analyze throughput patterns and adjust buffer settings and scaling accordingly

controls.title: Implement data lifecycle policies
controls.description: Configure appropriate storage classes and lifecycle policies for destination storage

implementation.description: Configure S3 Intelligent Tiering or lifecycle transitions for long-term data storage cost optimization

controls.title: Monitor and alert on cost anomalies
controls.description: Implement cost monitoring and alerting for Firehose usage

implementation.description: Set up AWS Budgets and Cost Anomaly Detection for Firehose service costs with appropriate alert thresholds

controls.title: Optimize error handling and retry logic
controls.description: Implement efficient error handling to minimize retry costs and failed delivery charges

implementation.description: Configure appropriate retry duration and error output prefix to minimize processing costs for failed records
